attributes.action: Keep free school meals  and abolish free lunches for mps
attributes.additional_details: Sometimes lunch is the only hot meal some children will recieve for the day and by taking  away free school meals they are pushing families further into poverty, Mps use taxpayer money for all sorts including free lunch so please sign my petition
attributes.background: Mps have voted that 1 million children should lose their free school meals, i say we vote back and put a stop to it
